metadata.title: CVE-2021-21223 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in Mojo in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.85 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
